directions: [["In a large pitcher, add diced fruit and lemonade concentrate. "],["Add wine and allow fruit to macerate for at least 30 minutes in the refrigerator. "],["Add liquor and soda, stir gently and enjoy."],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""],[""]]
